task.title: Extract the open-search-server folder from the archive
task.shortdesc: Uncompress and/or unarchive the package file using your favorite tool.

step.cmd: Use your favorite tool to uncompress the archive and extract the open-search-server folder.

choices.choice: Windows / Mac: usually you can double click on the archive to decompress it and extract the folder.
ZIP archive on Unix system: You can use the unzip command line utility, for example: unzip open-search-server-XXX.zip
TAR.GZ archive on Unix: You can use the tar command line utility, for example: tar -zxvf open-search-server-XXX.tar.gz
